packages.title: Pose Bones
packages.description: Custom Node for accessing the blend data on active/selected pose bones in the scene
packages.author: blanchsb

packages.title: Collections & Objects without Phyton in Serpens 3 (Beginner Node Tree)
packages.description: This is not an Addon, I`m new to Serpens an figured out how to create a Collection and Objects inside Without Python. I hope it is helpful for Beginners like me. I colored the nodes and did some Annotations to make it more clear. This is maybe not the way how Professionals would do it but I think it works and maybe helps Beginners.
packages.author: loomig
